players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us remain vigilant and focused on identifying the culprit behind this heinous act."

Charlie: "I agree with Alice, let's focus on finding the culprit behind Diana's death. We need to work together as a team and carefully consider each piece of information we gather during our discussions."
Charlie: "I believe we should all share any information or suspicions we may have about the recent events in our community. Let's work together to uncover the truth and bring justice for Diana."

Bob: "I believe that the truth will only come to light if we all work together and share any information or suspicions we may have. Let's not let fear or mistrust divide us, but rather use this tragic event as an opportunity to strengthen our community bonds and bring justice for Diana."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us remain vigilant and focused on identifying the culprit behind this heinous act."

Charlie: "I agree with Alice, let's focus on finding the culprit behind Diana's death. We need to work together as a team and carefully consider each piece of information we gather during our discussions."
Charlie: "I believe we should all share any information or suspicions we may have about the recent events in our community. Let's work together to uncover the truth and bring justice for Diana."

You: "I believe that the truth will only come to light if we all work together and share any information or suspicions we may have. Let's not let fear or mistrust divide us, but rather use this tragic event as an opportunity to strengthen our community bonds and bring justice for Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
